response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value to me. I understand its worth to you stands at $1,200,000. My proposal is to offer it to you for $1,350,000. This price reflects a strategic midpoint between our perceived values, aiming to be fair and reasonable while ensuring a satisfactory return for me. I believe this offer presents an excellent chance for both of us to benefit from this transaction. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1350000}
